attributes.action: Ban lorries on the UK's roads every Sunday & Bank Holiday
attributes.additional_details: In-line with several other EU countries this petition seeks support for a total ban of all HGV traffic (over 3 tons) on all UK roads from 2200hrs each Saturday through to 0200hrs each Monday. In addition this ban should apply in the same manner for all UK Bank Holidays, greatly easing congestion on the UK's roads.
